pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw: You could open the inspector by double-clicking the item in the 2D View and choose the `X` option for the texture. I agree it's not very easy to find. @spaepcke , should we add a blank texture option to the palette? What kind of icon would it have, where would it go? I guess an `X` after the 3 existing textures would be ok.
